alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 10:29AM CDT until March 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 020, 021, 034, AND 035... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 008, 009, 020, 021, 034, and 035. * WIND...South winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 14 to 25 percent in the afternoon. * THUNDERSTORMS...Thunderstorms are unlikely during the afternoon, though can`t be ruled out during the evening in the warning area. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
